alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:28PM EDT until May 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MECKLENBURG AND WEST CENTRAL BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brodnax to 7 miles southwest of South Hill to Boydton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Mecklenburg and west central Brunswick Counties, including the following locations... Fairview, Rogers Corner, North View, Baskerville, Forksville, Wightman and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
